name: SMART SCHOOL EDUCATION
overview:
Founded by the alumni of IIT, IIM and DCE, SmartSchool EDUCATION Pvt Ltd is a leading eLearning Company based in Delhi.

Innovation through technology forms the core DNA of the company.

Only Company in INDIA with 100% 3D animation content designed for INDIAN user. One of the largest repositories of e-learning content in India.

The company has been actively providing innovative educational solutions to various educational institutions in India and abroad. With a core expertise in software and Indian teaching pedagogy, the company has core competence in creating technology based education solutions to the clients for both the private and government space
